name: gera_vis_o_da_rua
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool consulta_cnpj_tempo_real.
Tool description: API Tempo Real de Consultas a Receita Federal, Simples Nacional e Cadastro de Contribuintes (SINTEGRA).
API description: Generates a street view image for a given CNPJ using the Toolbench API.

cnpj.description: The CNPJ (Brazilian company identifier) for which the street view image is to be generated.

fov.description: The field of view for the street view image. Default is None.

height.description: The height of the street view image. Default is None.

width.description: The width of the street view image. Default is None.
